attributes.title: It's a Chinese spyware
attributes.review: Do not download! It has Chinese trackers and spyware. They collect your data to see if your packing. They steal your personal information and still it on the orange market. I'm warning you, do not download!

attributes.title: Really? Was it that necessary?
attributes.review: Out of all things this you big guys could create, you chose a trump app? A trump app. Honestly what has this world come to😭 Also all you have to do is watch the news if your thirsty for Trump Tea🍵

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I got this app to be able to relate with Karen, didn’t find anything worth while. The app glitches. Highly would not recommend this app ... nothing interesting and full of stupidity.

attributes.title: Glitch in the app
attributes.review: There’s a glitch in the app which makes your phone turn off completely what a waste and overall this app shouldn’t even exist😌

attributes.title: You are America’s Problem
attributes.review: Um..... the fact that you used “your” money to make an app that doesn’t even help America is pathetic. When you could be helping other communities!!! #worstpresidentever

attributes.title: O
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible it kept glitching and making my phone over heat and my phone doesn’t do that I was trying to used this app as a reason to vote for him but know I’m absolutely voting for Biden ❄️

attributes.title: What a horrible app.
attributes.review: I downloaded who’s app and I can't even start to tell you how bad the graphics are. It made my phone glitch so back I had to get a whole new software, and to do this it costed me $300. Dollars !!!

attributes.title: Ehhh🧑🏾‍🦯
attributes.review: Downloaded the app to see what is was about you know but then I kept seeing Cheetos pop up on my screen and patna Ian like that. Was glitching and yellow wigs was just flying across my screen so I was like nah can’t have that.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: People are right.. trump hasn’t built the wall and this app is just making me mad. Every time I have to check my email for something important it’s always the trump app. Like who cares

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Worse app I’ve ever used. Crashed right as I opened??? Then had even more issues as I went passed every annoying message. Wish I never had it on my phone.
